ul.li: Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ObservationInterpretation where concept is-a ObservationInterpretationDetection

description.value: Interpretations of the presence or absence of a component / analyte or organism in a test or of a sign in a clinical observation. In keeping with laboratory data processing practice, these concepts provide a categorical interpretation of the "meaning" of the quantitative value for the same observation.
